sentences.english: It will bottom out at some point.
sentences.chinese: 在某時它會降到最低點。

sentences.english: Please come and help me sometime next week.
We meet like two travelers on their journeys, at a point of time, and together wait for the morning sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 於是我們像偶遇的旅者，在某時某刻，一起等待曙光。

sentences.english: One day at a certain time, to return.
New students will come to our school sometime next week.
sentences.chinese: 新學員將於下週某時來校。

sentences.english: In global history, what really matters is living standards.
sentences.chinese: 全球史的終極議題是某時某地的生活水準。

sentences.english: This Someday/Maybe list can include a wide range of projects and topics.
sentences.chinese: 將來某時這個列表可以包括廣泛的項目和主題。

sentences.english: At some point or another, you're going to hate some aspect of money.
sentences.chinese: 在某時某刻，你會討厭金錢的某些方面。

sentences.english: Well, we all have to die from something, sometime.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有人終歸要在某時因某種原因而死。

sentences.english: His glory you shall see sometime, somewhere.
sentences.chinese: 某時某地你必見祂榮光。

sentences.english: Howver, I still like to think that it really did happen, somewhere, sometime.
sentences.chinese: 然而我仍然願意想像它是個某地某時真正發生過的事。

sentences.english: You will fail at some point in your life.
sentences.chinese: 你可能在生活中的某時某刻遭遇失敗。

sentences.english: I make believe sometime someday, I would tell you, I feel all the same.
sentences.chinese: 妾信某日某時，妾將告君妾心永駐。

definition: to rebel against orthodoxy/to depart from established practices
tied up in a bundle on a high shelf/to put sth on the back burner/no longer a high priority
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
to pass on a story/to communicate a message
